alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 1:12AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern St. Louis and southwestern Lake Counties through 145 AM CST... At 111 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Knife River, or 23 miles northeast of Superior, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Two Harbors, Silver Bay, Beaver Bay, Castle Danger, Larsmont, Split Rock Lighthouse, Knife River, Stoney Point, Alger, Gooseberry Falls State Park, Split Rock Lighthouse State Park, and Palmers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
